abstract: Research in Motion offers Blackberry users $100 credit for select apps in its online store as apology for a service collapse that left millions of devices without service for up to three days; limited selection may leave customers grumbling.
snippet: The limited selection of appealing software, however, may still leave BlackBerry customers grumbling.
lead_paragraph: The limited selection of appealing software, however, may still leave BlackBerry customers grumbling.

headline.main: RIM Offers Free Apps in Apology
headline.print_headline: RIM Offers Free Apps In Apology
headline.seo: RIM Offers Free Apps as Apology for Shutdown
